word:
Ellen Confident God Will Lead James White--I expected to meet you here, but I believe God will lead you. I commit all to Him. He knows what is best for us, for His cause, and His people. We wait and hope and pray that God will in His providence open your way and lead you to the position you should take. I 


                                    -32- 

know God wants you to live and plan and counsel His people, but not to work and bear unnecessary burdens.
